TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. They all wish for your painful death.

I wish for actual gaming skills.

Granted, you can't use them.

I wish for an extra sense without surgery.

Edited December 2, 2014 by LABHOUSE

Granted. You receive 2 extra senses of pain. One can see pain, another can taste pain.

I wish to know what pain looks like.

Granted. It looks like a rocket at the speed of light about to slam into your face.

I wish more people could identify flags correctly.

Granted. I'm not one of them. Why have you got an East Korean flag as your avatar?

I wish furmark didn't stutter. It's just annoying.

Granted. I have no idea what furmark is so instead I give you YouTube which buffers so much that it drives you insane.

I wish that I didn't have a headache.

Granted, you stop feeling anything.

I wish I quit smoking.

granted, you instead inhale rocket smoke

I wish for my coach to stop making us do bear crawls

Granted, he now makes you wrestle bears.

I wish for Ceres to be mine.

Granted. Ceres is now on an impact trajectory with your home.

I wish I could go for a flight in an F-14.

granted, your in the backseat with Maverick in the pilot seat.

i wish that voyager 2 would have unlimited electrical power.

Granted. It overheats and breaks.

I wish that Voyager 1 would have unlimited electrical power and not overheat.

granted. it explodes.

i wish for explosions

Granted: there's now war in your country. Happy?

I wish for less explosions.

Granted. All explosions become impossible. While you're driving across Death Valley in a petrol-powered vehicle.

I wish to skip an hour right now.

Granted, in the hour you skipped, you won a trillion dollars, but since you didn't pick up the phone, it was given to someone else.

I wish for a miniature Saturn V replica.

Granted. It's fully functional, but a small insect lands on the controls, while you're holding it. *cue screams and fire everywhere*

I wish for unlimited wishes.

Wish for a-

I think you can guess

Granted, but it's got Luftwaffe markings for some reason, and you can't repaint it.

I wish for you to guess.

More achievements I guess.

I wish for my Spitfire to have SAAF markings for the orange bit in it instead of the red!

Granted, but the person who put the markings there sabotaged the plane, making it crash.

I wish i had a rocket launcher, some rockets, a licence to use them and some get out of jail free cards.

Granted, but you accidentally kill a mafia leaders family with it, and the mafia comes and rips your spine out.

I wish for a solid-gold jet pack.

to heavy to fly.

I wish I could make things light. and have infinite boosters to strap to them

Granted. The infinite boosters fly wild and kill your grandmother, and if she's already dead, kill her again.

I wish for a space program.

Granted. It makes Top Gear's effort look professional.

I wish Top Gear's shuttle had worked.
